privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data on our website in accordance with Art. 13 GDPR.

sections.title: 1. Data Collection and Processing
content: When you visit our website, technical information is automatically collected (IP address, browser type, operating system, access time). This data is necessary for the technical provision of the website.
Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in providing a functional website).

sections.title: 2. Umami Analytics
content: We use Umami Analytics, a privacy-friendly analytics tool. Umami is only activated if you select "Accept all" in the cookie banner.
Umami does not collect personal data and does not use cookies (only localStorage). IP addresses are anonymized.
Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR (your consent via the cookie banner).
You can revoke your consent at any time on the cookie page.

sections.title: 3. Storage Duration
content: Technical log data is stored for a maximum of 14 days.
Analytics data is stored anonymized and aggregated for statistical evaluation.

sections.title: 4. Data Disclosure
content: Your data will only be disclosed to third parties if this is required by law or you have expressly consented.
Hosting: Our website is hosted by [Hosting Provider]. The hoster processes technical data on our behalf (Art. 28 GDPR).

rights: Information about your stored data (Art. 15 GDPR)
Complaint to a supervisory authority (Art. 77 GDPR)
privacy.rightsExercise: To exercise your rights, please contact us at:
privacy.authorityText: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority regarding the processing of your personal data. In Germany, this is your respective state data protection officer.
